## Data Reading

```{r}
census_2010<-read_csv("https://www4.stat.ncsu.edu/~online/datasets/EDU01a.csv")

sectiontwo <- read_csv("https://www4.stat.ncsu.edu/~online/datasets/EDU01b.csv")
```

## Data Processing

## Question 1: Column Selection

```{r}
#Select columns with area name, STCOU, and any column
#that ends in D
census_2010<- census_2010|> 
  select(Area_name, STCOU, ends_with("D"))|>
  rename(area_name=Area_name)
head(census_2010,n=5L)
```

## Question 2: Long Format Conversion

```{r}
#Convert the tibble into long format
census_2010<- census_2010|> 
  pivot_longer(selected_data, cols = ends_with("D"), names_to = "Survey", values_to = value)
head(census_2010,n=5L)
```
